item.title: Weighted-Least-Square
item.description: Introduction Nowadays, having a business implies օwning a website. The primary aim of a website is to provide information, which is crucial in the modern business world. Suppose a website owner aims at increasing the number of visitors in order to have more views, sales or popularity. To achieve this goal, one first needs to understand the factors affecting web traffic. The vast majority of small businesses try to increase website hits or visits via advertisements.
